html:
8.28.20  12:15 am   i love hearing about the failing and the succeeding of the making of your songs! do you have any more stories about them?

      yes

8.27.20  11:45 pm   When making an album, one where each song is meant to be listened to in the order they are put in,

     that always seems to ruin the songs for me

     should each song be tonally consistent? Or is it ok for each one to feel different, as long as it's telling a story? I'd love your thought on this.

     my therapist and i have come to the conclusion that i don't like albums. this will inspire people to give me some stern lectures, i'm sure, but let me try to explain my story. every time i have ever listened to all the songs on an album in the order they are listed, my very strong reaction is usually something like 'aah, these songs are all ruining each other'. Where as every time i have ever heard just ONE song, in its own special place, and in its own special context, regardless of what song it is, good or bad, my immediate reaction is usually "WOW WHAT A GREAT SONG! MY NEW FAVORITE SONG, GIVE ME THAT SONG OH MY GOODNESS WOW, THIS SONG, (POINTS TO SONG) NEW FAVORITE SONG RIGHT HERE"

8.27.20  11:35 pm   what are your thoughts on life

      impossible but still pretty good somehow

8.27.20  11:17 pm   what do i do when i want to remove a certain instrument form my song but said instrument is so important in making the song that it'd be difficult to find an alternative

      just try taking it out and finding another one. then if that fails 3 times, you have to go back to the first one because it's the best thing you're gonna get for now, and you can hope to try something different next time

8.27.20  11:06 pm   why do you do things

      to see what it's like

8.27.20  10:27 pm   When u have a song idea and u start to record what are the first instruments you use to lay down an idea? 

      i don't record songs until they are all the way written. to write, however, i also 'record' but not in the same sense. in this way, record is just a modern substitute for writing things down. done with just a 1 track voice memo app. and i just use a plain keyboard sound and my voice, played at the same time. also with explanations about how it works, how it goes, and anything else i might need to know

8.27.20  10:15 pm   8.25.20 4:40 pm Why would "unfortunately," [sic] be the worst swear word, let alone a swear word in general?

      "unfortunately" is a word that means "i'm about to tell you something bad". when you see that word you know something is bad. that's why it is considered a bad word

8.27.20  8:41 pm   modernism, post-modernism, or post-post-modernism?

      check the calendar and see if it's the future yet, and make your decision accordingly

8.27.20  8:32 pm   How is the new video?

      just audio so far

8.27.20  8:17 pm   what are the possibilities? 

      good, bad, completely unknown whether it's good or bad,

8.27.20  8:05 pm   what if there was a language with only 120 words

      it would be awesome

8.27.20  8:00 pm   Should my potato be self aware?

      all potatoes are aware of each other. they use an awareness-share system

8.27.20  7:57 pm   Have you ever gone somewhere or done something that had a serious impact on your life?

     yes

      Was it good or bad?

     i've done both

8.27.20  7:18 pm   effects tutorials, please...

      barely even made them yet

8.27.20  7:00 pm   how to not forget words

      write them into a story

8.27.20  6:39 pm   What do you think the relationship between music and puzzles is? If there is one.

      music is like a puzzle where the goal of the puzzle is not said or known. so the only way to figure out what you're doing, or why, is to play

8.27.20  5:52 pm   Did you ever get that editing new editing software you talked about in the h3 podcast,

     nah, took the high road.

     and if so how much do you like it?

     it's a cliff. i'm climbing a cliff. i don't like how steep it is but i really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really like how high it goes

8.27.20  5:28 pm   What is your favourite key?

      the space bar

8.27.20  4:36 pm   What is a conversation 

      it's like a 7 course dinner meal

8.27.20  4:26 pm   would you ever eat the letter h?

      no

8.27.20  4:23 pm   What is the longest swear word?

      llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch

8.27.20  4:19 pm   what do you think youre doing?

      being normal

8.27.20  3:56 pm   do you exist hypothetically, theoretically, or actually?

      got to do all 3 for a balanced healthy lifestyle

8.27.20  3:50 pm   how are you so c r e a t i v e 

      i failed the turing test too many times and now i am trying to get revenge

8.27.20  3:49 pm   Do you hate it when you're flying a plane and hit a deer?

      not as bad as when you're flying a deer and you hit a plane

8.27.20  3:47 pm   how hard is it to make regular videos?

      so easy, they make themselves

8.27.20  3:44 pm   what is  t i m e?

      this may not be what you wanna hear, but it's you

8.27.20  3:43 pm   Have you had any real life experiences that have inspire your songs, or do you just make them up?

     doing both is the winning move, i find

8.27.20  3:30 pm   Do you know you're a legend?

      i thought you were

8.27.20  2:59 pm   How can you learn to fly

      see if you can walk a little bit higher each day

8.27.20  2:56 pm   Will you clean your room?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

8.27.20  2:46 pm   which would you say is the steely dan album that influenced you the most?

     i have only been influenced negatively by albums. no matter how many great songs might be on an album, being presented with 12 new songs at exactly the same time somehow puts every song in a fatiguing context. as much as i want to believe, i've never seen it work. where as, singles, just hearing 1 song at a very special time in a very special place, .... makes every song seem magic.

      because the more i listen to everything must go (the whole album not just the song) i become more convinced that that's the one, i just hear so much of you in it... or it in you

     i have no idea which songs were sold on which album. i only have a rough estimation of when they were made, simply based on the sound. which sometimes can be deceiving actually

8.27.20  2:24 pm   what was the bad thing you did

      tried to rate how good a thing is

8.27.20  2:19 pm   are birds actually made of trees

      each bird and tree is every tree and bird

8.27.20  2:15 pm   are you sad all the time

      no

8.27.20  1:44 pm   Do you wanna go to Burger King?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.27.20  1:29 pm   when are you going to post a new song/youtube video?

      right away

8.27.20  1:04 pm   Is derpiness the key to what makes your videos so good

      that is just one of the many tools in my tool kit

8.27.20  12:42 pm   What projects are you currently working on

     songs but there's gonna be videos too

      and when do you plan on releasing them

      a lot and often, but very soon

8.27.20  12:39 pm   asking for a friend do you really own a blimp

     no

      because I've never seen one before and they are probably very expensive

      i suppose that's why it felt like such an intriguing idea to me

8.27.20  12:19 pm   what inspires you to make music?

      everything

8.27.20  12:18 pm   Will ohio be eliminated

      i doubt it

8.27.20  12:08 pm   Do you prefer silly questions on here, or actual more serious questions?

      don't you get it, seriousness is silly, and silliness is serious

8.27.20  11:06 am   was it intentional that you made this pages colors nonbinary pride colors? if not, thanks anyway :D

      perhaps just similar taste

8.27.20  10:26 am   What was your inspiration for your very unique type of art/music style?

      the very unique world we all seem to be in

8.27.20  10:18 am   I'm going to pyongyang north korea for vaction,

     i don't believe you

     what advice would you give in terms of places to go, etc. 

      try to find one of those places that doesn't make you isolate yourself for 2 weeks when you get there

8.27.20  9:59 am   Ahem, what do you do at the airport terminal while walking down the airport terminals hallways

      contemplate the great wonder of life

8.27.20  9:49 am   How did tou started making... Well... You now... Your things.

      i recall being in a huge field at some point. almost crying about what a perfect size it is

8.27.20  9:35 am   What is your favourite song you've produced so far?

      i would prefer to produce a new one to be my favorite

8.27.20  9:07 am   do more music?

      i almost didn't even think of that
